Am looking for Mishima a life In Four Chapters on VHS/DVD PAL, am
verging on failing BA. without it - posties wrecked copy i got from USA
. and i desparatly need a copy as it is the central item to my final
BA(hons) degree project. Am gonna fail if i cant get it!   Have vast
list of "haves" feature films incl. quite a few samurai films, like the
Babycart series, some Kurosawa, etc, also have documentry on Akira
Kurosawa on VCD so if you have this Mishima video i can trade 1 for 1,
just let me know your wants list please reply please please please
please please. Laura in England
